jobDescription: Flagship Credit Acceptance LLC (Flagship) is an independent auto finance company headquartered in Chadds Ford, PA. With regional offices in Irving, TX, Irvine, CA, and Phoenix, AZ, the company has originated over $6 billion in auto finance contracts, serving over 10,000 automotive dealerships across the country. In addition to the traditional indirect dealer channel, we have also positioned ourselves to meet the changing needs of consumers as they shift to online lending, by heavily investing in our online loan channel (direct lending) called CarFinance.com  We are seeking smart, passionate analysts that are seeking to transform complex data into valuable organizational insights/strategies. Essential Functions and Responsibilities: As a member of the risk department, you will have a birds eye view into every part of the organization. Your role may include: Combining data from multiple data sources to generate portfolio insightsOptimizing our statistical pricing models through the use of big dataUsing data mining and machine learning techniques to identify fraudCreating a new portfolio dashboard that shows how our company is performingHelping to lead the development of our analyst data warehouseQualifications:Will have obtained a Bachelors Degree or higher prior to August 2018 in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Finance, Engineering, MIS, Statistics, or related field requiredStrong quantitative, analytical, and problem-solving skillsAbility to perform in a rapidly changing, high-intensity environmentStrong desire to achieve and succeedIntellectually curious and willing to challenge oneself by taking on new tasksStrong communication skills and detail orientedThe candidate will have experience in high-growth company environments, where creative solutions and cross-functional teams are required. Demonstrating an honest, professional, ethical standard is essential. The position will be located at the company's Irving, TX office
